products.title: Get ready for a repositioned end call button in iOS 17
products.author: The Verge
products.content: Apple’s redesigned call interface repositions the red end call button, moving it closer to the other controls.
products.subject: Tech

products.title: The Morning After: Which Samsung foldable should you buy?
products.author: Engadget
products.content: Samsung’s newest foldables, the Z Flip 5 and Z Fold 5, have been put through their paces by Engadget’s team of skilled reviewers. If you are wondering which of these two you should lay your cash down for, then we’ve got all the information you need.
products.subject: Tech
